XREquirectLayer.summary: The XREquirectLayer interface of the WebXR Device API is a layer that maps equirectangular coded data onto the inside of a sphere.

remarks.para: XREquirectLayer requires the layers feature to be enabled for the . You can request it in .
To create a new XREquirectLayer, call either:
To present layers to the XR device, add them to the layers render state using .
